data.title: FHWA Road Weather Management
data.text:
Links

Statewide Road Weather Condition Web Sites

The following list includes 48 web sites from 40 states that provide road weather information.

Alaska Road Traveler Information Service (includes Weather-Related Alerts)

Arizona DOT Roadway Conditions

Arkansas State Highway and Transportation Department, Weather Related Road Conditions (free download required)

Colorado DOT Real-Time Road and Traveler Information

Delaware DOT Weather Stations

Florida 511 Weather Conditions and Advisories

Georgia Navigator Weather Monitoring Stations

Idaho Transportation Department Traveler Services (includes Weather, Winter Driving & Mountain Pass conditions)

Illinois DOT Winter Road Conditions

Indiana DOT Road Weather Sensors

Iowa DOT Weatherview (includes RWIS & ASOS station data)

Kansas DOT RWIS Map and Weather Data

Kansas DOT Weather Related Road Conditions

Kentucky Transportation Cabinet Roadway Weather Information System

Maine DOT Travel Information Service (includes Road Conditions, Weather Forecasts & Weather Alerts)

Maryland DOT Weather Stations

Michigan State Police Winter Travel Advisory

Minnesota DOT Traffic and Road Conditions

Mississippi Department of Public Safety Weather/Road Conditions

Missouri DOT Winter Road Conditions

Montana DOT Road Weather Information System

Montana DOT Weather-Related Road Report Map

Nebraska Department of Roads Traveler Information Portal (includes Weather and Road Condition data)

Nevada DOT Road Weather Information System

Nevada DOT Road Conditions (includes Snow Tire/Chain Requirement & High Wind Advisory/Warning data)

New England 511

New Hampshire DOT Traveler Information, Weather Conditions

New York 511 Traffic, Travel and Transit Information

New York State Thruway Authority Winter Travel Advisory

North Carolina DOT Traveler Information Management System (includes Adverse Weather data)

North Dakota DOT Road Weather Information System

North Dakota DOT Road Conditions

Ohio DOT Road Weather Information System Portal

Ohio DOT Winter Road Conditions

Oklahoma Department of Public Safety Road Conditions

Oregon DOT Road Weather Conditions

Pennsylvania DOT Road Weather Information System

Pennsylvania Turnpike Travel Conditions Map (includes Weather Station layer)

South Carolina DOT Winter Road Conditions

South Dakota DOT Winter Road Condition Report (includes Interactive Road Weather Condition Map & Summary Report)

Tennessee Smartway Information System (includes Weather-Related Road Conditions)

Texas DOT Road Conditions Map (includes Flood & Ice/Snow)

Utah DOT Road Conditions (includes Weather layer)

Virginia DOT Road Alerts

Washington State DOT Weather Information (includes Weather Station, Pavement Temperature & Mountain Pass data)

West Virginia DOT Current Road Conditions for Major Highways

Wisconsin DOT Online Travel Center (includes RWIS and Winter Road Condition Report)

Wyoming DOT Road Report (includes Atmospheric Condition data)

Government Web Sites

U.S. Department of Transportation

Research and Innovative Technology Administration (RITA) National Transportation Library

Associations & Programs

American Association of State Highway Transportation Officials (AASHTO)

American Meteorological Society (AMS)

American Public Works Association (APWA)

Aurora Program

Clear Roads: Research for Winter Highway Maintenance

Cooperative Program for Operational Meteorology, Education and Training (COMET)

Enterprise Program

Institute of Transportation Engineers (ITE)

Salt Institute Road Salt References

Standing International Road Weather Commission (SIRWEC)

Snow and Ice Cooperative Program (SICOP)

Transportation Research Board (TRB)

World Road Association (PIARC)

Intelligent Transportation Systems (ITS)

ITS Joint Program Office

ITS Electronic Document Library

ITS Standards

National ITS Architecture

ITS America

Major Initiatives

Clarus Initiative

Weather Information
